mapper.select: select count(view_id) from notification_view where ref_to = #{user_id}

select sender.*, nv.seen from users_details ud, notification_view nv inner join (select CONCAT(ud.cognome, ' ', ud.nome) AS from_userfullname, n.* from notifications n, users_details ud where n.from_user = ud.user_ref) sender on sender.notification_id = nv.notification_ref where nv.ref_to = #{user_id} and ud.user_ref = sender.from_user
order by sender.notification_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

select sender.*, nv.seen from users_details ud, notification_view nv inner join (select CONCAT(ud.cognome, ' ', ud.nome) AS from_userfullname, n.* from notifications n, users_details ud where n.from_user = ud.user_ref) sender on sender.notification_id = nv.notification_ref where nv.ref_to = #{user_id} and ud.user_ref = nv.ref_to and sender.notification_id = #{notificationId}
select nv.seen from notification_view nv where nv.ref_to = #{to} and nv.seen = false limit 1
